Amazing game that always comes with new, fun and fresh content !
The new Operation Broken Fang comes with:
- New way to spend the points earned during the operation !
- 7 New maps
"Ancient", "Engage", and "Apollo" to Scrimmage, Casual and Deathmatch game modes.
"Guard" and "Elysion" to Wingman game mode
"Frostbite" to DangerZone game mode
- 3 New Case/Collections ---> Ancient, Control and Havoc !
- 20 New Agents !
- New Broken Frag sticker capsule !
- New Skill group patches !
- New Recoil, Graffitis and stickers !
- Added new customizable chat wheel feature.
For more information :  www.counter-strike.net/brokenfang
